input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 8" Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Northlight Washington Frasier Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 25' x 17" Pre-Lit Buffalo Fir Commercial Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 5' Pine & Pinecones Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 10' Outdoor Lit Marbled Poinsettia Celebration Garland'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Outdoor Mixed Evergreen Wreath'
  - Name='6' Flocked Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 White Warm LED Lights and Pine Cones'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 6' x 9" Pre-Lit Decorated Mixed Pine and Pine Cone Artificial Christmas'
  - Name='One Allium Way Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9 Foot Long Pre Lit Aspen Spruce Garland with 100 UL Clear LED Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 9 ft. x 10" B/O Glittery Garland'
  - Name='Ashland 5ft. Berry & Leaves Coiled Garland'
  - Name='Glitzhome 24" Pre-Lit Glittered Pinecones Artificial Christmas Garland Set and Wreath (2'
  - Name='Ashland 5ft. Cream Pom Pom Coiled Garland'
  - Name='Glitzhome 6ft Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Christmas Garland with 35 Warm White LED Lights and Timer'
  - Name='Ashland LED String Lights Garland'
  - Name='Haute Decor 12" Noble Pine Garland Ties'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6ft. White Mountain Pine Artificial Garland with 35 White Warm LED Lights and Pinecones'
  - Name='Costway 4pcs Pre-Lit Christmas Decoration Set with Garland Wreath and Entrance Trees'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 8" Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar product type (artificial pine garland) and size but a different brand and pine variant (Canadian Pine vs Carolina Pine) without explicit pre-lit lights, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Washington Frasier Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same product type but different fir variant (Frasier Fir) and no detail about length or lights, so somewhat relevant but less so.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Product is a tree, not a garland, so limited relevancy despite same brand and Carolina Pine species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 25' x 17" Pre-Lit Buffalo Fir Commercial Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland of different fir variant (Buffalo Fir) and much longer size intended for commercial use, less relevant for typical home garland comparison.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 5' Pine & Pinecones Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar product type and decoration (pinecones), but shorter length and unclear if pre-lit, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 10' Outdoor Lit Marbled Poinsettia Celebration Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit outdoor garland but decorated heavily with poinsettias rather than pine-based foliage, diverging from reference's natural pine and cone style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Outdoor Mixed Evergreen Wreath
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wreath, not a garland, and mixed evergreen rather than pine garland, thus very low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6' Flocked Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 White Warm LED Lights and Pine Cones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size mid-length garland with LED lights and pine cones, close in function and style although lacking specific pine type or branch detail.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A tree product, not a garland, despite the Carolina Pine name, thus low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6' x 9" Pre-Lit Decorated Mixed Pine and Pine Cone Artificial Christmas
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A pre-lit pine and pine cone garland similar in decoration but shorter length, relevant though different brand and mixed pine type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: One Allium Way Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit garland of artificial Christmas greenery, but brand and pine type unspecified, moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9 Foot Long Pre Lit Aspen Spruce Garland with 100 UL Clear LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit feature but uses aspen spruce rather than pine, so relevant but less precise match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 9 ft. x 10" B/O Glittery Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit glittery garland likely decorative with glitter, diverges from natural pine look, and brand/style differ significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland 5ft. Berry & Leaves Coiled Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Contains berries and leaves, shorter length, and different style, less relevant to pine and cone pre-lit garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 24" Pre-Lit Glittered Pinecones Artificial Christmas Garland Set and Wreath (2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short length, glittered style, and set including wreath differ significantly from natural pine pre-lit garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland 5ft. Cream Pom Pom Coiled Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-pine themed with cream pom poms and short length, low relevancy to reference pine garland.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 6ft Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Christmas Garland with 35 Warm White LED Lights and Timer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit, similar length, snowy flocked pine garland, relevant though flocking and brand differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ashland LED String Lights Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely just string lights or minimal foliage, insufficient similarity to a full pine garland with decorations.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 12" Noble Pine Garland Ties
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland ties are accessories, not garlands themselves, extremely low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6ft. White Mountain Pine Artificial Garland with 35 White Warm LED Lights and Pinecones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length, pre-lit, pine with pinecones, close match in type but different specific pine type and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 4pcs Pre-Lit Christmas Decoration Set with Garland Wreath and Entrance Trees
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes garland and other items in a set, partially relevant but set nature and unknown garland details lower score.
